gov.fnal.ppd.signage.util

Class DisplayColorSliderUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.SliderUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicSliderUI
          • gov.fnal.ppd.signage.util.DisplayColorSliderUI

  • public class DisplayColorSliderUI
extends BasicSliderUI
    Implement a JSlider. This is used when there are too many Displays to show on a ChannelSelector as individual buttons.
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation
